item.description: About Extole’s SDK and Why You Should Use It # Extole’s Mobile SDK for iOS / Android allow you to load content through native build code or launch a WebView hosted experience in-app. The Extole SDK allows you to easily: Initialize a connection from your Mobile App to your Extole marketing programs Identify your users to Extole to power capabilities for targeting campaigns, delivering appropriate rewards, executing A/B tests, and more.

item.title: Client API
